results.name: First differences of A143097.
formula: a(n)=(1/3)*{-2*(n mod 3)+4*[(n+1) mod 3]+[(n+2) mod 3]}-[C(2*n,n) mod 2], with n>=0 [From _Paolo P. Lava_, Sep 29 2008]
